i=f("style"),i.type="text/css",i.id="s"+c,(p.fake?p:d).appendChild(i),p.appendChild(d),i.styleSheet?i.styleSheet.cssText=e:i.appendChild(n.createTextNode(e)),d.id=c,p.fake&&(p.style.background="",p.style.overflow="hidden",u=S.style.overflow,S.style.overflow="hidden",S.appendChild(p)),s=t(d,e),p.fake?(p.parentNode.removeChild(p),S.style.overflow=u,S.offsetHeight):d.parentNode.removeChild(d),!!s}function d(e,n){return!!~(""+e).indexOf(n)}function p(n,r){var o=n.length;if("CSS"in e&&"supports"in e.CSS){for(;o--;)if(e.CSS.supports(u(n[o]),r))return!0;return!1}if("CSSSupportsRule"in e){for(var i=[];o--;)i.push("("+u(n[o])+":"+r+")");return i=i.join(" or "),c("@supports ("+i+") { #modernizr { position: absolute; } }",function(e){return"absolute"==getComputedStyle(e,null).position})}return t}function v(e,n){return function(){return e.apply(n,arguments)}}function m(e,n,t){var o;for(var i in e)if(e[i]in n)return t===!1?e[i]:(o=n[e[i]],r(o,"function")?v(o,t||n):o);return!1}function h(e,n,o,i){function s(){l&&(delete O.style,delete O.modElem)}if(i=r(i,"undefined")?!1:i,!r(o,"undefined")){var u=p(e,o);if(!r(u,"undefined"))return u}for(var l,c,v,m,h,g=["modernizr","tspan","samp"];!O.style&&g.length;)l=!0,O.modElem=f(g.shift()),O.style=O.modElem.style;for(v=e.length,c=0;v>c;c++)if(m=e[c],h=O.style[m],d(m,"-")&&(m=a(m)),O.style[m]!==t){if(i||r(o,"undefined"))return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0;try{O.style[m]=o}catch(y){}if(O.style[m]!=h)return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0}return s(),!1}function g(e,n,t,o,i){var s=e.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+e.slice(1),a=(e+" "+j.join(s+" ")+s).split(" ");return r(n,"string")||r(n,"undefined")?h(a,n,o,i):(a=(e+" "+P.join(s+" ")+s).split(" "),m(a,n,t))}var y=[],_=[],C={_version:"3.3.1",_config:{classPrefix:"",enableClasses:!0,enableJSClass:!0,usePrefixes:!0},_q:[],on:function(e,n){var t=this;setTimeout(function(){n(t[e])},0)},addTest:function(e,n,t){_.push({name:e,fn:n,options:t})},addAsyncTest:function(e){_.push({name:null,fn:e})}},Modernizr=function(){};Modernizr.prototype=C,Modernizr=new Modernizr;var w,S=n.documentElement,b="svg"===S.nodeName.toLowerCase();!function(){var e={}.hasOwnProperty;w=r(e,"undefined")||r(e.call,"undefined")?function(e,n){return n in e&&r(e.constructor.prototype[n],"undefined")}:function(n,t){return e.call(n,t)}}(),C._l={},C.on=function(e,n){this._l[e]||(this._l[e]=[]),this._l[e].push(n),Modernizr.hasOwnProperty(e)&&setTimeout(function(){Modernizr._trigger(e,Modernizr[e])},0)},C._trigger=function(e,n){if(this._l[e]){var t=this._l[e];setTimeout(function(){var e,r;for(e=0;e<t.length;e++)(r=t[e])(n)},0),delete this._l[e]}},Modernizr._q.push(function(){C.addTest=s});var x=C._config.usePrefixes?" -webkit- -moz- -o- -ms- ".split(" "):["",""];C._prefixes=x;var T=function(){var n=e.matchMedia||e.msMatchMedia;return n?function(e){var t=n(e);return t&&t.matches||!1}:function(n){var t=!1;return c("@media "+n+" { #modernizr { position: absolute; } }",function(n){t="absolute"==(e.getComputedStyle?e.getComputedStyle(n,null):n.currentStyle).position}),t}}();C.mq=T;var E=C.testStyles=c;Modernizr.addTest("touchevents",function(){var t;if("ontouchstart"in e||e.DocumentTouch&&n instanceof DocumentTouch)t=!0;else{var r=["@media (",x.join("touch-enabled),("),"heartz",")","{#modernizr{top:9px;position:absolute}}"].join("");E(r,function(e){t=9===e.offsetTop})}return t});var z="Moz O ms Webkit",P=C._config.usePrefixes?z.toLowerCase().split(" "):[];C._domPrefixes=P;var j=C._config.usePrefixes?z.split(" "):[];C._cssomPrefixes=j;var N=function(n){var r,o=x.length,i=e.CSSRule;if("undefined"==typeof i)return t;if(!n)return!1;if(n=n.replace(/^@/,""),r=n.replace(/-/g,"_").toUpperCase()+"_RULE",r in i)return"@"+n;for(var s=0;o>s;s++){var a=x[s],u=a.toUpperCase()+"_"+r;if(u in i)return"@-"+a.toLowerCase()+"-"+n}return!1};C.atRule=N;var A=function(){function e(e,n){var o;return e?(n&&"string"!=typeof n||(n=f(n||"div")),e="on"+e,o=e in n,!o&&r&&(n.setAttribute||(n=f("div")),n.setAttribute(e,""),o="function"==typeof n[e],n[e]!==t&&(n[e]=t),n.removeAttribute(e)),o):!1}var r=!("onblur"in n.documentElement);return e}();C.hasEvent=A,Modernizr.addTest("pointerevents",function(){var e=!1,n=P.length;for(e=Modernizr.hasEvent("pointerdown");n--&&!e;)A(P[n]+"pointerdown")&&(e=!0);return e});var L={elem:f("modernizr")};Modernizr._q.push(function(){delete L.elem});var O={style:L.elem.style};Modernizr._q.unshift(function(){delete O.style}),C.testAllProps=g;var k=C.prefixed=function(e,n,t){return 0===e.indexOf("@")?N(e):(-1!=e.indexOf("-")&&(e=a(e)),n?g(e,n,t):g(e,"pfx"))};C.prefixedCSS=function(e){var n=k(e);return n&&u(n)};o(),i(y),delete C.addTest,delete C.addAsyncTest;for(var q=0;q<Modernizr._q.length;q++)Modernizr._q[q]();e.Modernizr=Modernizr}(window,document);
!function(e){var n=navigator.userAgent,i=/Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Kindle|NetFront|Silk-Accelerated|(hpw|web)OS|Fennec|Minimo|Opera M(obi|ini)|Blazer|Dolfin|Dolphin|Skyfire|Zune/gi;e&&e.addTest&&(e.addTest("mobile",function(){return i.test(n)&&e.mq("only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 639px)")}),e.addTest("tablet",function(){return i.test(n)&&!e.mobile}))}(Modernizr);
  </script>
 </head>

    <li aria-controls="submenu_shop" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Shop" class="new-sidepanel-menu-parent-item has-children" data-id="16" role="button" tabindex="0">
     <div>
      <a href="https://shop.goodhousekeeping.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" title="Shop">
       Shop
      </a>
      <span class="sidepanel-submenu-toggle">
      </span>
     </div>
     <ul class="new-sidepanel-submenu" data-parent-id="16" id="submenu_shop">
      <li class="new-sidepanel-submenu-item">
       <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Safe-Home-LEAD-Drinking-Water/dp/B089551H6Y?ref_=ast_sto_dp&amp;_encoding=UTF8&amp;tag=ghk-lift-20&amp;linkCode=ur2&amp;linkId=6fc7bd3ab32af2eea80cb106e770a954&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
        Water Test Kits
       </a>
      </li>
      <li class="new-sidepanel-submenu-item">
       <a href="https://breathesanitizer.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">
        Hand Sanitizer
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </li>
    <li class="new-sidepanel-menu-parent-item" data-id="17">
     <a href="/promotions/">
      Promotions
     </a>
    </li>
    <li class="new-sidepanel-menu-parent-item" data-id="18">
     <a href="http://sweepstakes.goodhousekeeping.com/">
      Win
     </a>
    </li>
   </ul>
   <ul class="sidepanel-location-choice-menu">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Welcome to Breakfast Week
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="746d6b2a-c16b-43b9-8ba7-821ee810df02" data-vars-block-slot="2" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item skipping-breakfast image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Welcome to Breakfast Week" data-vars-position="1" href="/health/diet-nutrition/a34862002/skipping-breakfast/">
           <img alt="clock on plate with fork and knife" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skipping-breakfast-index-1615497696.jpg?crop=0.753xw:1.00xh;0.130xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skipping-breakfast-index-1615497696.jpg?crop=0.753xw:1.00xh;0.130xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skipping-breakfast-index-1615497696.jpg?crop=0.753xw:1.00xh;0.130xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skipping-breakfast-index-1615497696.jpg?crop=0.753xw:1.00xh;0.130xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/skipping-breakfast-index-1615497696.jpg?crop=0.753xw:1.00xh;0.130xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="clock on plate with fork and knife"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Welcome to Breakfast Week" data-vars-position="1" href="/health/diet-nutrition/a34862002/skipping-breakfast/">

           </a>

      <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="b9f1c8db-ecef-483d-8162-99e403c8031e" data-vars-block-slot="3" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Block">
       <div class="custom-item how-to-support-asian-american-community-hate-crimes-violence text-under">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-2x1" data-vars-cta="Big Story 3" data-vars-position="1" href="/life/a35630674/how-to-support-asian-american-community-hate-crimes-violence/">

          </span>
          <img alt="asian hate crimes" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=640:* 640w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:* 980w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=1024:* 1024w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-stop-asian-hate-crimes-1614363840.png?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=1120:* 1120w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="asian hate crimes"/>

        <div class="custom-item vaccine-volunteer-nurse image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Parenting" data-vars-position="4" href="/life/parenting/a35651696/vaccine-volunteer-nurse/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="covid 19 vaccine volunteer nurse" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-covid-vaccine-nurse-1614374709.png?crop=0.755xw:1.00xh;0.173xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="COVID-19 Vaccine Volunteer Nurse"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Parenting" data-vars-position="4" href="/life/parenting/a35651696/vaccine-volunteer-nurse/">
            I'm a Vaccine Nurse, and It Feels Awesome
           </a>

             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">

      <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="ffe4e941-8e25-48e5-af8c-d28b02d82a67" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Block">
       <div class="custom-item easter-egg-decorating-ideas text-under">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-2x1" data-vars-cta="Big Story 7" data-vars-position="1" href="/holidays/easter-ideas/g419/easter-egg-decorating-ideas/">

            <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gh-020921-best-lip-plumper-1613676339.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.237xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">

           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="beauty lab" data-vars-position="3" href="/beauty-products/g35472018/best-lip-plumpers/">
             15 Best Lip Plumpers for Fuller Lips
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item mary-kay-clinical-solutions-retinol column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="beauty lab" data-vars-position="4" href="/beauty/anti-aging/a35311516/mary-kay-clinical-solutions-retinol/">
            <img alt="how to use retinol" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ghkxmarykay-lede-1-1611944176.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.330xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ghkxmarykay-lede-1-1611944176.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.330xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ghkxmarykay-lede-1-1611944176.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.330xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ghkxmarykay-lede-1-1611944176.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.330xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ghkxmarykay-lede-1-1611944176.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.330xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <div class="sponsor sponsor-inline custom-item-sponsor created-for">
             <div class="sponsor-bar-inner">
              <div class="sponsor-label">

         <div class="custom-item-inner">

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/goodhousekeeping/assets/css/homepage.a16c04c.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/goodhousekeeping/assets/css/homepage-mobile.12f4150.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
